response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for me. This unique item is not just a possession but a testament to years of dedication and craftsmanship. I believe its true worth surpasses the conventional monetary value, making it a treasure that could enrich your collection or serve a purpose dear to your heart.

To extend this opportunity to you, I am offering the product for sale at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant discount from its intrinsic value, allowing you to secure a piece that might otherwise be out of reach.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions about the product or would like to discuss further details, I am more than happy to provide additional information. I am confident that once you understand the depth and significance of this item, you will see the wisdom in this pricing.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
